arm_group.description: placebo administered subcutaneously to match denosumab

brief_summary.textblock:
To evaluate the inhibitory effect of progression, compared with placebo, in joint
      destruction by AMG 162 administered subcutaneously to rheumatoid arthritis patients

clinical_study.brief_title: AMG 162 (Denosumab) Phase 3 Study (DESIRABLE Study) in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis on Disease-modifying Antirheumatic Drugs (DMARDs) Treatment

detailed_description.textblock:
To evaluate the inhibitory effect of progression, compared with placebo, in joint
      destruction by AMG 162 administered subcutaneously at a dose of 60 mg every 6 months or
      every 3 months for 12 months to rheumatoid arthritis patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Diagnosed with rheumatoid arthritis according to the American College of Rheumatology
             (ACR) criteria for rheumatoid arthritis classification (1987 revision) or the 2010
             ACR-EULAR (The European League Against Rheumatism) classification criteria for
             rheumatoid arthritis

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Functional class IV according by the ACR revised classification (1991)

intervention.description: placebo administered subcutaneously to match denosumab

clinical_study.official_title: A Confirmatory Study of AMG 162 (Denosumab) in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis on DMARDs Treatment (Phase III)

overall_official.affiliation: Division of Rheumatology Department of Internal Medicine, Keio University

oversight_info.authority: Japan: Pharmaceuticals and Medical Devices Agency

primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Total Sharp Score (TSS) from baseline to month 12.
primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Total Sharp Score (TSS) at month 12

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Total Sharp Score (TSS) from baseline to month 6.
secondary_outcome.measure: change form baseline in TSS at month 6

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Erosion Score from baseline to month 6.
secondary_outcome.measure: change form baseline in Erosion Score at month 6

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Joint Space Narrowing from baseline to month 6.
secondary_outcome.measure: change form baseline in Joint Space Narrowing at month 6

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Erosion Score from baseline to month 12.
secondary_outcome.measure: change form baseline in Erosion Score at month 12

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Joint Space Narrowing from baseline to month 12.
secondary_outcome.measure: change form baseline in Joint Space Narrowing at month 12

secondary_outcome.description: percent change from baseline in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at month 12
secondary_outcome.measure: percent change from baseline in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at month 12

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment
